👋 Hey, I'm Zain — a founder and tinkerer, currently working as a Founder's Associate at incident.io.

I'm excited about building, being creative, and beautiful design. I like to strive for excellence, and I love meeting new people along the way.

I recently left the corporate world to experience the fast pace and magic of a Series B startup.
